results.title: Guided tours - Tallinna Linnamuuseum
results.content: The tours are available in Estonian, English, Russian, and Finnish. Group size is limited to 20 persons. The tour will take about 1 h 20 min.

results.title: Kiek in de Kök Fortifications Museum in Tallinn | Viking Line
results.content: The Kiek in de Kök Fortifications Museum, with its underground passages and defence towers, immerses visitors in the fascinating history of the city of Tallinn.

results.content: The tower Kiek in de Kök together with the passages of the Ingrian and Swedish bastions is an exciting part of Tallinn historical fortifications.
